summary: The story happens in an old house in an old city of Iran. Because of the wedding of the youngest sister, Pasandide, all of her sisters come to their old house to help their mother.
cast: Reza Kianian|Negar Javaherian|Farhad Aslani|Saeed Poursamimi|Parivash Nazarieh|Rima Raminfar|Asghar Hemmat|Hedayat Hashemi|Amir-Hossein Arman|Puneh Abdolkarim-Zadeh|Negar Abedi|Shamsi Fazlollahi|Sheida Khaligh|Baran Kosari|Rooholah Mofidi|Soheyla Razavi|Ahmad Yavari Shad|Mohammad R. Zadsorour
director: Director: Reza Mirkarimi (as Seyyed Reza Mir-Karimi)
title: Ye habe ghand
